original_text: And the children of Benjamin were numbered at that time out of the cities twenty and six thousand men that drew sword, beside the inhabitants of Gibeah, which were numbered seven hundred chosen men.
korean_text: 그 때에 그 성읍들로부터 나온 베냐민 자손의 수는 칼을 빼는 자가 모두 이만 육천 명이요 그 외에 기브아 주민 중 택한 자가 칠백 명인데

sentences.original_text: And the children of Benjamin were numbered at that time
out of the cities twenty and six thousand men
which were numbered seven hundred chosen men
